name: Range Shooter (itch)
description:
Shoot down the targets and score has many points as you can within a minute.

A game by Kielan Todd, This is the first game that I have made. It is my dream to be game developer, any feedback bad or good will be appreciated.

You can follow my next project on Instagram @kielangamedev or on facebook Kielan Game Dev.

How to play the game:

Use WASD to move

Use Left mouse to shoot
